item.description: It's the end of the Mayan Calendar, which means one of two things.  In either case, let's show the Mayans that despite the calendar is ending, we can still game as if there is always a tomorrow! :P  So... I plan on hosting some games this night for those that wish to not be alone just in case it all goes to hell in a hand basket.  For those that don't think anything will happen, well you can come up and game too just for the hell of it then!  Hope to see you there - games start at 5:00pm and will go to whenever people want to leave.
item.name: End of Days Gaming Get Up
